description: A futuristic UI design system for a cryptocurrency staking dashboard. The design uses a dark, space-themed background, a structured grid of data cards with custom shapes, and vibrant neon glows in magenta and blue to create an engaging and informative user experience.

primary.name: primary-background
primary.description: Very dark purple/black with a subtle noise or starfield texture.

secondary.name: card-background
secondary.description: A dark purple used for the background of data cards, with a subtle internal texture.

accent-glow-primary.name: vibrant-magenta-glow
accent-glow-primary.description: A bright, glowing magenta/purple used for borders, titles, and disclaimers.

accent-glow-secondary.name: bright-blue-glow
accent-glow-secondary.description: A vivid blue used for primary buttons and some card borders.

text-primary.name: primary-text
text-primary.description: White for main data points and titles.

text-secondary.name: secondary-text
text-secondary.description: Light grey for subtitles and descriptive text.

text-highlight.name: highlight-green
text-highlight.description: A bright neon green for key performance indicators like APY.

button-primary.name: primary-button-gradient
button-primary.description: A cyan-to-blue gradient for primary call-to-action buttons.

disclaimer-banner.name: full-width-disclaimer-bg
disclaimer-banner.description: The solid magenta background for the full-width disclaimer banner.

typography.fontFamily: Sans-Serif, a futuristic or techno-style font like 'Orbitron' or 'Exo 2'

layout.structure: A centered, single-column layout with a header, a main content area featuring a grid of data cards, and a footer.
layout.gridSystem: A responsive grid for the data cards, likely transitioning from 3 or 2 columns on desktop to a single column on mobile.

header-nav.name: main-navigation-bar
header-nav.description: The main site header with navigation links. The active link is highlighted.

page-title-banner.name: main-title-container
page-title-banner.description: A custom-shaped container for the main page title with a glowing border and textured background.

primary-button.name: view-leaderboard-button
primary-button.description: The main call-to-action button, styled with a gradient and glow.

data-card.name: stat-card
data-card.description: The primary container for displaying a single data metric.

gradient-data-card.name: stat-card-gradient-border
gradient-data-card.description: A variation of the data card with a gradient border.

rewards-container.name: total-rewards-card
rewards-container.description: A large, distinct container for showcasing total accrued rewards.

decorative-icons.name: floating-reward-tokens
decorative-icons.description: Small, decorative token icons floating within the rewards container.

claim-button.name: claim-rewards-button
claim-button.description: The button used to claim rewards.

disclaimer-banner-fullwidth.name: page-disclaimer-bar
disclaimer-banner-fullwidth.description: A full-width banner at the bottom of the content area for disclaimers.

footer.name: main-site-footer
footer.description: The standard site footer containing logo, links, and social media icons.
